statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM transaction_history;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount < 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%123%' AND transaction_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_id FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT wallet_address FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) ORDER BY wallet_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, wallet_address FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT wallet_owner, wallet_address FROM wallet_details ORDER BY wallet_owner DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_owner, wallet_address FROM wallet_details WHERE wallet_owner LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT wallet_address, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM wallet_transactions GROUP BY wallet_address HAVING total_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions INNER JOIN wallet_details ON wallet_transactions.wallet_address = wallet_details.wallet_address WHERE wallet_owner = 'Alice'
SELECT wallet_address, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM wallet_transactions GROUP BY wallet_address ORDER BY transaction_count DESC
SELECT DISTINCT wallet_owner FROM wallet_details
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_address, transaction_id, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, user_id FROM wallet_addresses WHERE wallet_id = 123;
SELECT wallet_address, total_spent FROM spending_patterns WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY total_spent ASC;
SELECT pattern_id, average_spent FROM spending_patterns WHERE average_spent < 500;
SELECT * FROM wallet_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT wallet_address, amount FROM wallet_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM wallet_transactions GROUP BY wallet_address HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
SELECT w.wallet_address, s.total_spent FROM wallet_addresses w JOIN spending_patterns s ON w.wallet_address = s.wallet_address;

SELECT w.wallet_id, w.wallet_address, s.total_spent FROM wallet_addresses w LEFT JOIN spending_patterns s ON w.wallet_address = s.wallet_address WHERE s.total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY s.total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM wallets
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY wallet_address ASC
SELECT user_name FROM wallet_users WHERE wallet_id = 3
SELECT transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE wallet_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM spending_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 2
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT wallet_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%A%'
SELECT wallet_id, SUM(transaction_amount) as total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY wallet_id HAVING total_spent > 5000
SELECT wallets.wallet_id, wallets.wallet_address, transactions.transaction_amount FROM wallets JOIN transactions ON wallets.wallet_id = transactions.wallet_id
SELECT wallet_id, user_name FROM wallet_users WHERE user_name = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT wallet_address, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT wallet_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY wallet_address;
SELECT th.transaction_id, th.wallet_address, th.amount, ta.transaction_type FROM transaction_history th JOIN transactions ta ON th.transaction_id = ta.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT wallet_address, amount FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_addresses WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT wallet_address, spending_category, total_amount_spent FROM spending_patterns WHERE total_amount_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_amount_spent DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
